short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetch and display GPU, CPU, and network information

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This script retrieves and displays detailed information about the system's GPU, CPU, and network configuration. It gathers data on the GPU's specifications, the CPU's model and performance metrics, and the network interfaces' status and addresses. The output provides a comprehensive overview of the system's hardware and network setup. Ideal for system diagnostics and performance monitoring.
